items.title: Deploy Application to AWS Lambda
items.description: Package and deploy the existing application to run on AWS Lambda, ensuring compatibility with the serverless environment.
acceptance_criteria: Application code is successfully packaged in a format supported by AWS Lambda (e.g., ZIP or container image).
Lambda function is created and configured with correct runtime, memory, and timeout settings.
Application runs without errors when triggered in AWS Lambda.
Deployment process is documented and repeatable.
dependencies: AWS CLI or deployment tool configured
non_functional: Lambda cold start time should be under 1 second for supported runtimes.

notes: Assumed that the application is already developed and only needs deployment to AWS Lambda. No details provided on language, runtime, or triggers; these will need clarification.
